welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Oro Valley, where the desert meets the mountains! Known for its breathtaking scenery and warm hospitality, we invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Avra Valley Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Avra Valley Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport serves both commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Davis Monthan AFB Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tucson International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Concourse
terminals.description: The South Concourse at Tucson International Airport is primarily used for regional flights.

terminals.name: North Concourse
terminals.description: The North Concourse at Tucson International Airport is used for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marana Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Marana Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
